page.description: <<%DELIMITER% ... %DELIMITER% allows you to define a quoted character string. This command is typically used when the string includes carriage return-line feed characters (CR-LF).
page.syntax:
List as C = <<%DELIMITER% string1 string2 ... stringN
%DELIMITER%

section.note: You must not have any space characters between <<%DELIMITER% and string.

<<%code% and <<%dlg% are special cases. The first defines a block of Xbasic code and turns on the Xbasic autohelp and color coding within the string. The second defines a block of Xdialog code and turns on the Xdialog autohelp and color coding within the string. Additionally, <<%html%is special in version 6. It defines a block of HTML code and turns on the HTML autohelp and color coding within the string.
